file_content.text: T3-G2 = maintaining cover // You = proceed with operations!
You = act casual // T3-G2 = recruiting for classified operation
Ah, just the Jedi we were looking for. Nice work, T3.
The commander of Havoc Squad? You've really outdone yourself, T3.
You're not easy to find, Captain. But I imagine that's a good thing in your line of work.
That's quite a collection you've found, T3. Nice work.
I'm with the SIS. We've got a very special event coming up, and you're on the guest list.
What kind of "special event"?
The kind the Empire won't enjoy. Details when we meet in person--see you soon.
Meeting location data = provided // You = maintain operational secrecy at all costs!
T3-G2 = engaged in classified operation // You = move along!
Tee-three. Has Theron Shan checked in lately?
Suspicious eyes = everywhere // You = stand closer
Theron Shan = on mission // You = back him up?
What kind of mission?
Theron Shan = investigating high-level treason // Potential conspirators = everyone // You = trust no one!
Theron Shan location = Manaan // You = travel cautiously + watch for tails!
Theron Shan location = Manaan // You = move out!
You = finally shown up // Theron Shan = requires assistance // Priority = maximum
What kind of assistance? Does Theron have another mission for me?
Area = not secure // Theron Shan = waiting to discuss // Location = briefing room
You = move quickly // Mission = high importance!
You = hurry // Theron Shan = needs your help!
Theron Shan = unknown person // T3-G2 = standard astromech droid // You = move along!
T3-G2 = maintaining cover // You = proceed with operations!
